name: Rob -The Cowboy
description:
"Rob - The Cowboy" is an early demo of a cartoonish puzzle-platformer in development. You control Rob, who wakes up after a rough night, and you must jump, punch, shoot, explode and puzzle-solve your way back to town, in order to figure out what happened last night, and where you left your hat!

The game is in early stage. So feel free to comment about your experience with the demo.
